page.title: 11 STATION HOUSE
page.content: Station House at Ashton-under-Hill is now owned by Mr and Mrs Woodward who moved there in 1975. The house used to be lived in by the Station Master and the last train ran in about 1945. There used to be a well but it was filled in because Mr and Mrs Woodward had young grandchildren. They own 7 acres of land . It is mainly rough wasteland and pasture. The platform remains but all of the rails have been pulled up and the waiting rooms were bulldozed down accidentally. You can see where they went.
